name: HorrorTrivia
0:
”Alexa, open Horror Trivia.”
”Alexa ask horror trivia to give me a horror fact.”
”Alexa open horror trivia and tell me something.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: horror trivia
des: This is a skill that tells you interesting horror movie trivia. It will tell you a horror movie fact every time it is called.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
